class Inference[source]

Inference(weights_path, categories, max_size=None)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

predict_segmentation[source]

predict_segmentation(file, categories, max_size, show_probs, palette)

Predict segmentation of an image.

file: The image file to do the inference. categories: The category list of the data-set. max_size: The max allowed image size. show_probs: Whether or not to show the probability distribution.

return: An ImageSegmentation result.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

predict_classification[source]

predict_classification(file, max_size, show_probs)

Predict classification of an image.

file: The image file to do the inference. max_size: The max allowed image size. show_probs: Whether or not to show the probability distribution.

return: An ImageClassification result.

{% endraw %}
